nodes.name: Climb Bottom Right Door (to Pit Room)

runways.name: Base Runway - Climb Bottom Right Door (to Pit Room)
Runway with Broken Blocks - Climb Bottom Right Door (to Pit Room)

strats.name: Base
strats.note: This longer runway requires the bottom bomb wall to be destroyed.

locks.name: Climb Bottom Right Escape Lock (to Pit Room)

reusableRoomwideNotable.name: Climb Behemoth Shinespark
reusableRoomwideNotable.note: Diagonal shinespark up the climb to break the bomb blocks to the morph tunnels on the right. For the top block, spark from a crouch.

reusableRoomwideNotable.name: Climb G-Mode Morph Insane IBJ to Top
reusableRoomwideNotable.note: Using IBJ to get from to bottom to the top of Climb without unmorphing. Precise timing and enemy manipulations are required to reach the top without taking a hit.

reusableRoomwideNotable.name: Climb Temporary Blue Chain Through Bomb Blocks
reusableRoomwideNotable.note: A long Temporary Blue chain with x-ray turnarounds to climb up and destroy the bomb blocks blocking the morph tunnels.

strats.name: G-Mode through Bomb Blocks
strats.note: Overload PLMs using scroll blocks a few tiles in front of the bomb blocks.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph through Bomb Blocks
strats.note: Overload PLMs using the scroll block next to the bomb blocks.
strats.devNote: PBs cannot be used, as they will solidify the bomb blocks.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph through Bomb Blocks
strats.note: Overload PLMs using the scroll block next to the bomb blocks.

strats.name: Climb Temporary Blue Chain Through Bomb Blocks (Bottom Left to Top)
strats.reusableRoomwideNotable: Climb Temporary Blue Chain Through Bomb Blocks
strats.note: A long Temporary Blue Chain with x-ray turnarounds to climb up and destroy the bomb blocks blocking the top morph tunnel.

strats.name: Climb G-Mode Morph Blind Climb to the Top
note: Overload PLMs using the scroll blocks next to the bomb wall
After passing through, you need to go from the bottom to the top of Climb and into the bomb blocks while still in G-mode Morph.
Samus will not be visible at all; the only available feedback is audio and position on the map.

strats.name: Climb Temporary Blue Chain Through Bomb Blocks (Bottom Left to Bottom)
strats.reusableRoomwideNotable: Climb Temporary Blue Chain Through Bomb Blocks
strats.note: A Temporary Blue Chain with x-ray turnarounds to climb up and destroy the bomb blocks blocking the bottom morph tunnel.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph Blind
note: Overload PLMs using the scroll blocks next to the bomb wall
Navigate to the lower right bomb blocks while still morphed.
Samus will be off-camera and not visible, requiring blind movement.
Enemies will not hurt Samus since they are non-global and also off-camera.

strats.name: G-Mode through Bomb Blocks
strats.note: Overload PLMs using the scroll blocks immediately in front of the bomb wall

strats.name: Zebes Ablaze
strats.devNote: These are destroyed on entry if Zebes is Ablaze.

strats.name: G-Mode through Bomb Blocks
note: Overload PLMs using the scroll block at the top of the stairs immediately in front of the bomb blocks.
Reach the bottom and pass through the bomb blocks while still in G-mode.
strats.devNote: PBs cannot be used, as they will solidify the bomb blocks.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph through Bomb Blocks
note: Overload PLMs using the scroll block at the top of the stairs immediately in front of the bomb blocks.
Fall down to the lower bomb blocks while still in G-mode Morph.
strats.devNote: PBs cannot be used, as they will solidify the bomb blocks.

strats.name: SpeedBall
strats.note: Mockball on the platform below the morphball tunnel and springball jump in while staying blue.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph through Bomb Blocks
strats.note: Overload PLMs using the scroll block at the top of the stairs next to the bomb blocks.
strats.devNote: PBs cannot be used, as they will solidify the bomb blocks.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph through Bomb Blocks
note: Overload PLMs using the scroll block at the top of the stairs next to the bomb blocks.
Fall down and pass through bomb wall at the bottom while still in G-mode.
strats.devNote: PBs cannot be used, as they will solidify the bomb blocks.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph
note: Overload PLMs using the scroll block at the top of the stairs next to the bomb blocks.
If Morph is not available, careful movement is needed with SpringBall to reach the top without taking a hit or unmorphing.

strats.name: Climb G-Mode Morph Insane IBJ to Top (from Crateria Supers Bottom)
strats.reusableRoomwideNotable: Climb G-Mode Morph Insane IBJ to Top
note: Overload PLMs using the scroll block at the top of the stairs next to the bomb blocks.
A long series of precise bomb jumps and enemy manipulations are required to reach the top without taking a hit.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph IBJ with PBs
note: Overload PLMs using the scroll block at the top of the stairs next to the bomb blocks.
Place PBs as high as possible to occasionally kill multiple pirates at a time.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph through Bomb Blocks
strats.devNote: PBs cannot be used, as they will solidify the bomb blocks.

strats.name: Climb Temporary Blue Chain Through Bomb Blocks (Bottom Right to Top)
strats.reusableRoomwideNotable: Climb Temporary Blue Chain Through Bomb Blocks
strats.note: A long Temporary Blue Chain with x-ray turnarounds to climb up and destroy the bomb blocks blocking the top morph tunnel.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph
note: Overload PLMs using the scroll block next to any of the bomb blocks in the room, allowing passage through the bomb blocks at the top by making them become air.
If Morph is not available, careful movement is needed with SpringBall to reach the top without taking a hit or unmorphing.

strats.name: Climb G-Mode Morph Insane IBJ to Top (from Pit Room)
strats.reusableRoomwideNotable: Climb G-Mode Morph Insane IBJ to Top
note: A long series of precise bomb jumps and enemy manipulations are required to reach the top without taking a hit or unmorphing.
Overload PLMs using the scroll block next to the bomb blocks at the top, allowing passage through them by making them become air.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph IBJ with PBs
note: Overload PLMs using the scroll block at the top of the stairs next to the bomb blocks.
Place PBs as high as possible to occasionally kill multiple pirates at a time.
Overload the PLMs at the bottom, if the top bomb block is hit with a PB before PLMs are overloaded, they will remain solid.

strats.name: Climb Temporary Blue Chain Through Bomb Blocks (Bottom Right to Bottom)
strats.reusableRoomwideNotable: Climb Temporary Blue Chain Through Bomb Blocks
strats.note: A Temporary Blue Chain with x-ray turnarounds to climb up and destroy the bomb blocks blocking the bottom morph tunnel.

strats.name: G-Mode Morph
note: Overload PLMs using the scroll block next to the bottom right bomb blocks, allowing passage through them by making them become air.
If Morph is unavailable, then careful movement will be required to get past the Pirates without taking a hit.
If using a PB to kill the pirates, overload the PLMs at the bottom. If the top bomb block is hit with a PB before PLMs are overloaded, they will remain solid.

strats.name: Zebes Ablaze
strats.devNote: These are destroyed on entry if Zebes is Ablaze.

strats.name: Behemoth Spark Top
strats.note: Starting with a crouch, diagonal shinespark to the top to break the bomb blocks to the morph tunnels on the right.

strats.name: Climb Temporary Blue Chain Through Bomb Blocks to Top
strats.reusableRoomwideNotable: Climb Temporary Blue Chain Through Bomb Blocks
strats.note: A long Temporary Blue Chain with x-ray turnarounds to climb up and destroy the bomb blocks blocking the top morph tunnel.
strats.devNote: The runway was reduced by 0.5 tiles, as you can't maintain Temporary Blue directly against a wall.

strats.name: Behemoth Spark Bottom
strats.note: Diagonal shinespark up the climb to break the bomb blocks to the morph tunnels on the right.

strats.name: Climb Moonfall Block Break
note: The bomb blocks can be broken by spinjumping with Screw attack and holding right, if moonfall makes Samus clip through the platform.
Use the small blue platform 2nd from the top on the right side.

strats.name: Climb Temporary Blue Chain Through Bomb Blocks to Bottom
strats.reusableRoomwideNotable: Climb Temporary Blue Chain Through Bomb Blocks
strats.note: A Temporary Blue Chain with x-ray turnarounds to climb up and destroy the bomb blocks blocking the bottom morph tunnel.
strats.devNote: The runway was reduced by 0.5 tiles, as you can't maintain Temporary Blue directly against a wall.

strats.name: Space Pirate Farm
devNote: The Space Pirates (wall) drop Supers and Power Bombs each at a 0.4% rate, too low to put into logic.
FIXME: Other nodes could be used to reset the room, with additional requirements.
